greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Trajectory of 1 under the morphism 1->(1,2,3), 2->(1,2), 3->(1) related to the heptagon and A006356.
comment: Given M = the generating matrix for the heptagon shown in A006356:
[1,1,1; 1,1,0; 1,0,0] take powers of M, extracting top row getting:
A006356, and middle column = A006054. n-th iterate of the sequence is
composed of A006356(n) terms parsed into a frequency of 1's, 2's, and 3's
matching the 3-termed vectors with appropriate sums.
link: P. Steinbach, Golden fields: a case for the heptagon, Math. Mag. 70 (1997), no. 1, 22-31.
Index entries for sequences that are fixed points of mappings
example: Starting with 1, the next two iterates are:
The 3rd iterate has 14 terms composed of six 1's, five 2's, and three 3's; matching the top row of M^3 = (6, 5, 3), sum = 14 = A006356(3).
mathematica: NestList[ Flatten[ # /. {1 -> {1, 2, 3}, 2 -> {1, 2}, 3 -> 1}] &, {1}, 5] // Flatten (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 23 2010 *)
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 18 2010
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 23 2010
